message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but $14,000 is a bit steep for me. Could you do any better on the price?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $13,000?
I appreciate you coming down, Alice.  How about we split the difference between our last offers and settle at $11,500?
I like your negotiating style, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $12,000, but I'm not sure if I can go any lower. What do you think?
